quotes: and I chose my route accordingly.
I could see the texture of its gray skin,
We couldn't define it precisely, but then
no one had ever satisfactorily defined
I remember when you'll be a month old.
that could be parsed in two entirely different ways
because we had direct experience of it.
from a sequential point of view,
but we never found that explanation
The ray of light has to know
where it will ultimately end up
before it can choose the direction and begin moving.
